parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.05</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Checks if the given AI feature is currently enabled. Feature may be one of:

* <tt>"AwareFormationSoft"</tt>
* <tt>"CombatFormationSoft"</tt> 

Since Arma 3 v1.95.145843 this command also supports [[disableAI]] / [[enableAI]] feature set via an alternative syntax.</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''checkAIFeature''' feature </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> feature: [[String]] (see description) </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] - [[true]] if is enabled</value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> unit '''checkAIFeature''' feature &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(''Since Arma 3 v1.95.145843'')</value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] - unit to test AI feature for </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> feature: [[String]] - [[disableAI]] / [[enableAI]] feature </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER22</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value>[[Boolean]] - [[true]] if is enabled </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part><part><name>x1 </name>=<value> <code>_featureUsed = [[checkAIFeature]] "AwareFormationSoft";</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2 </name>=<value> <code>_autotargetOn = bob [[checkAIFeature]] "AUTOTARGET";</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[enableAIFeature]], [[enableAI]], [[disableAI]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
